title: Mars Transit in the 7th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Mars transiting your seventh house intensifies dynamics in partnerships, marriage, and public dealings. Assertiveness rises in one-to-one interactions, creating a pushâ€“pull between cooperation and dominance. Attraction can spark quickly, but impatience or competitiveness may trigger conflicts if boundaries are unclear. Business negotiations become direct and outcome-oriented. When handled consciously, this transit strengthens courage in partnerships, decisive collaboration, and the ability to confront issues honestly without escalating tension.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Need to assert will in relationships increases.
Balance between self and others is tested.

sections.heading: Career
points: Client-facing roles become intense and active.

closing: Mars in the 7th house brings fire to partnerships. When assertiveness is balanced with respect, relationships become dynamic and productive.
